intro: Polyosma laetevirens, commonly known as the bright-green polyosma, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to Southeast Asia, particularly found in countries like Thailand, Vietnam, and Indonesia. The plant is characterized by its attractive, glossy green leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens and greenhouses.
